bug.author: abratchik
bug.summary: FlannBasedMatcher is not in java wrappers?
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => 3.1 Operating System / Platform => OSX 10.11.5 (15F34) Compiler => Xcode Version 8.0 (8A218a)
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
FlannBasedMatcher is excluded from features2d java wrappers - why? It seems to be more consistent to have it in features2d package since BFMatcher is there. I checked the wrapper generator code (gen_java.py) and it seems that FlannBasedMatcher was added to exceptions. What was the reason? Can we put it back? <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
